programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon turns his focus to cooking amazing food for parties at home, starting with spicy Mexican eggs - great for a brunch party.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon shows us some of the American inspired dishes he loves cooking for his family at home. Recipes include eggs, bacon and hash browns and peanut butter and jam cookies.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon goes full-on to produce great hearty food that packs a deliciously robust punch. Recipes guaranteed to keep you cosy, warm and wonderfully well fed include Welsh rarebit.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs cook bison with international flair. The winners meet some animal actors.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each team has thirty minutes to create vegetarian, sweet, meat and seafood breakfast dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams have only five minutes to gather ingredients for a rack of lamb, sea bass and chicken.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs compete in the annual blind taste test. The winners go on a shopping spree.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Nino's Italian Restaurant, where ownership has changed hands to an obnoxious son.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In Norwalk, Ohio, Chef Ramsay encounters the inflexible owner of Mill Street Bistro.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay continues to work with the owner of Mill Street Bistro to fix his belligerent attitude.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits a Caribbean style resort hotel in Fort Pierce, Florida where the young inexperienced owner, Brian is making guests' time at the hotel miserable with filthy rooms, late night concerts and shocking service.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon visits Island Park, Idaho to try and rescue the failing Angler's Lodge. Despite building the stunning lodge with his own hands, owner Dave Ebey has lost his passion and it has almost cost him his business.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are tasked with serving a room full of Marines. Food will represent the air, the land and the sea.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must compete in a sled race for an advantage in the winter soup challenge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: During the challenge, each team is tasked with cooking halibut seven different ways.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: For their challenge, the chefs must create a dish with potato as the key component.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Cookery Course
programme.desc: Gordon shares his perfect TV dinners. Recipes include delicious mushroom and leek pasta, stunning sweetcorn fritters with yoghurt dip plus Gordon shares his top tips for buying pasta.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Cookery Course
programme.desc: Gordon teaches us how to cook for special occasions. Recipes include stuffed lamb with spinach and pine nuts, Vietnamese-style fresh prawn rolls and a sumptuous whole sea bass stuffed with fennel, lemon and capers.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula demonstrates creative ways to prepare three classic steaks.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Far from traditional, Paula teaches guest chef Jenna Kinard the path to the perfect meatball.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula crafts three unique and easy-to-make pizzas with the help of her cousin, Don.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha creates four pasta sauces: traditional Bolognese, quick-and-easy puttanesca, rich carbonara, and a light sauce made with bottarga (a specialty of Southern Italy).

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Renowned seafood chef Dave Pasternack joins Martha for a lesson on buying, cleaning, filleting, and storing fish. Plus, an easy-to-prepare recipe for crudo.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Sauteing is one of the quickest and most versatile cooking methods. Martha prepares Wiener Schnitzel, chicken piccata, and sole à la meunière. Plus, pan sauces to serve with each.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and interns Asia Magee and Chassidy Carter as they take on the dishes made at Café Reconcile. Get ready to try Emeril's classic Crab Cakes, Fried Green Tomatoes, and Pineapple Cornbread.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friend Justin Kennedy of Parkway Bakery and Tavern as they explore a menu filled with classic New Orleans sandwiches. Emeril will make everything from the classic Po' boy to the Muffuletta.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.sub-title: BBQ Thighs and Fried Peach Pies
programme.desc: We make the ultimate barbecue chicken thighs and fried peach pies.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bridget makes Memphis-style Wet Ribs in the slow cooker and Ashley makes Mashed Potato Cakes.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.sub-title: Bourbon and Broccoli Hit the Grill
programme.desc: We make Grilled Bourbon Steak and Grilled Broccoli with Lemon and Parmesan.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Julia makes Citrus-Braised Pork Tacos and Christie makes Homemade Churros.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula cooks her traditional vegetable beef soup, staying faithful to the family recipe.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Renowned Chocolatier, Adam Turoni, shows Paula the artistry of some of his most decadent chocolate creations that are easier than any cook could make.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula "borrows" one of Michael's classic cars for a girl's road-trip picnic to Tybee Island!

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha shares techniques for three homemade stocks: chicken (including a pressure cooker version), beef, and vegetable. Plus, cooking and storage tips.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Butcher Evan Lobel joins Martha for a master class on meat. Learn how to choose and prepare the best cuts of meat to save you money.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Starting with a perfect pot of fluffy white rice, Martha demonstrates her techniques for a flavorful pilaf and a delicious Thai-style fried rice.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and young chef CJ Calhoun for a meal any kid would love! Dig into Bacon and Herb Roast Turkey Breast, Oven Roasted Crispy Broccoli, and end with Caramelized Sweet Potatoes.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril as he shows New Orleans Saints player Juwan Johnson and his wife Chanen how to prepare a classic Big Easy dinner.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his dear friend Chef Aaron Sanchez as they explore a menu inspired by a trip to Cuba: CubanStyle Picadillo and Sweet Potato Casserole, Arroz con Puerco, and, of course, Croquetas.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon embraces vegetarian home cooking as he creates a fantastic meat-free breakfast, lunch and dinner guaranteed to win over the most committed of carnivores.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon’s guide to the Ultimate Home Cooking continues with sensational comfort food that’s guaranteed to make you feel warm inside. Recipes include spiced baked porridge.
